message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of minimizing the time-average age of information over an erasure channel, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The coding strategies used to achieve this goal may involve control theory (cs.SY) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of random coding arguments to bound the average age is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG).
